title: Throne of Truth
description: The thrilling conclusion to Crown of Lies from New York Times Bestseller, Pepper WintersTWO YEARSSince my life changed for the second time and not necessarily for the better. Two years since I traded prison bars for streets and hunted a runaway who I'd met in an alley.TWO DAYSSince I forgot how to lie, woke to fists, and chased after the girl who'd been stolen from me.TWO HOURSTo save her, rescue her, keep my lies intact. She looks at me full of hate. I look at her full of confession.TWO MINUTESFor our relationship to switch from mutual dislike to floundering with unknowns. I've hurt her. Now, she's hurt me. I guess we're even.TWO SECONDSFor her to listen, to see, to finally know who I am. The answer comes with hardship. The answer isn't what she wants to hear.TWO BREATHSFor me to walk out the door.TWO HEARTBEATSFor it all to be over.
author: Pepper Winters
